Name: Horticulture and Plantation Sciences
Description: Focuses on the science of cultivating plants, fruits, vegetables, and ornamental plants, and managing plantations.
Faculty: Faculty of Agriculture Environment and Food Systems
Requirements: At least 2 'A' Level passes in Biology and one subject from Mathematics, Geography, Chemistry, Physics and Agriculture/Crop Science/Animal Science OR a Diploma in Agriculture from a recognized Agricultural College.

Name: Crop Improvement and Seed Systems
Description: Focuses on enhancing crop varieties and developing efficient seed production and distribution systems.
Faculty: Faculty of Agriculture Environment and Food Systems
Requirements: At least 2 'A' Level passes in Biology and one subject from Mathematics, Geography, Chemistry, Physics and Agriculture/Crop Science/Animal Science OR a Diploma in Agriculture from a recognized Agricultural College.

Name: Agricultural Equipment Design and Manufacturing Systems
Description: Focuses on the design, development, and manufacturing of machinery and systems for agricultural use.
Faculty: Faculty of Agriculture Environment and Food Systems
Requirements: At least 2 'A' level passes in Mathematics and Physics (compulsory). 5 'O' Level subjects including a pass in English Language and Mathematics, one Science Subject from: Biology, Chemistry, Physics, Integrated Science, Physical Science, Agriculture or Combined Science.

Name: Agricultural Processing Plant Design and Manufacturing Systems
Description: Focuses on the design and manufacturing of plants and systems for processing agricultural products.
Faculty: Faculty of Agriculture Environment and Food Systems
Requirements: At least 2 'A' level passes in Mathematics and Physics (compulsory). 5 'O' Level subjects including a pass in English Language and Mathematics, one Science Subject from: Biology, Chemistry, Physics, Integrated Science, Physical Science, Agriculture or Combined Science.

Name: Food Engineering
Description: Applies engineering principles to food processing, preservation, and packaging.
Faculty: Faculty of Agriculture Environment and Food Systems
Requirements: At least 2 'A' level passes in Mathematics and Physics (compulsory). 5 'O' Level subjects including a pass in English Language and Mathematics, one Science Subject from: Biology, Chemistry, Physics, Integrated Science, Physical Science, Agriculture or Combined Science.

Name: Water Resources and Irrigation Engineering
Description: Focuses on the management of water resources and the design of irrigation systems for agricultural and other uses.
Faculty: Faculty of Agriculture Environment and Food Systems
Requirements: At least 2 'A' level passes in Mathematics and Physics (compulsory). 5 'O' Level subjects including a pass in English Language and Mathematics, one Science Subject from: Biology, Chemistry, Physics, Integrated Science, Physical Science, Agriculture or Combined Science.

Name: Livestock Improvement and Genetic Conservation
Description: Focuses on enhancing livestock breeds and preserving genetic diversity.
Faculty: Faculty of Agriculture Environment and Food Systems
Requirements: At least 2 'A' Level passes in Biology (compulsory) and any one subject from Geography, Chemistry, Physics, Mathematics, and Agriculture/Crop Science/Animal Science OR a recognized National Diploma in Agriculture will be accepted for mature entry. 5 'O' Level subjects including a pass in English Language and Mathematics.

Name: Livestock Production and Nutrition Sciences
Description: Focuses on the scientific principles of livestock production and animal nutrition.
Faculty: Faculty of Agriculture Environment and Food Systems
Requirements: At least 2 'A' Level passes in Biology (compulsory) and any one subject from Geography, Chemistry, Physics, Mathematics, and Agriculture/Crop Science/Animal Science OR a recognized National Diploma in Agriculture will be accepted for mature entry. 5 'O' Level subjects including a pass in English Language and Mathematics.

Name: Meat and Dairy Science and Technology
Description: Focuses on the scientific and technological aspects of meat and dairy production and processing.
Faculty: Faculty of Agriculture Environment and Food Systems
Requirements: At least 2 'A' Level passes in Biology (compulsory) and any one subject from Geography, Chemistry, Physics, Mathematics, and Agriculture/Crop Science/Animal Science OR a recognized National Diploma in Agriculture will be accepted for mature entry. 5 'O' Level subjects including a pass in English Language and Mathematics.

Name: Rangeland Sciences and Livestock Production Ecology
Description: Focuses on the study of rangelands and their ecological relationship with livestock production.
Faculty: Faculty of Agriculture Environment and Food Systems
Requirements: At least 2 'A' Level passes in Biology (compulsory) and any one subject from Geography, Chemistry, Physics, Mathematics, and Agriculture/Crop Science/Animal Science OR a recognized National Diploma in Agriculture will be accepted for mature entry. 5 'O' Level subjects including a pass in English Language and Mathematics.

Name: Agricultural and Natural Resource Economics
Description: Focuses on economic principles applied to agricultural production and natural resource management.
Faculty: Faculty of Agriculture Environment and Food Systems
Requirements: 'A' Level passes in Mathematics or Economics/Business Studies/ and one subject from Accounts, Biology, Geography, Chemistry, Physics and Agriculture/Crop Science/Animal Science OR a Diploma in Agriculture from a recognized Agricultural College. 5 'O' Level passes including English Language, Maths (at least a Grade B in Mathematics and one Science subject from (Biology, Chemistry, Physics, Integrated Science, Physical Science, Agriculture or Combined Science).

Name: Agricultural Development and Communication Systems
Description: Focuses on strategies for agricultural development and effective communication within the sector.
Faculty: Faculty of Agriculture Environment and Food Systems
Requirements: 'A' Level passes in Mathematics or Economics/Business Studies/ and one subject from Accounts, Biology, Geography, Chemistry, Physics and Agriculture/Crop Science/Animal Science OR A Diploma in Agriculture from a recognized Agricultural College. 5 'O' Level passes including English Language, Maths (at least a Grade B in Mathematics and one Science subject from (Biology, Chemistry, Physics, Integrated Science, Physical Science, Agriculture or Combined Science).

Name: Agricultural Informatics
Description: Applies information technology and data science to agricultural practices and decision-making.
Faculty: Faculty of Agriculture Environment and Food Systems
Requirements: 'A' Level passes in Mathematics or Economics/Business Studies/ and one subject from Accounts, Biology, Geography, Chemistry, Physics and Agriculture/Crop Science/Animal Science OR a Diploma in Agriculture from a recognized Agricultural College. 5 'O' Level passes including English Language, Maths (at least a Grade B in Mathematics and one Science subject from (Biology, Chemistry, Physics, Integrated Science, Physical Science, Agriculture or Combined Science).

Name: Value Chain Development and Agricultural Marketing
Description: Focuses on optimizing agricultural value chains and marketing strategies for agricultural products.
Faculty: Faculty of Agriculture Environment and Food Systems
Requirements: 'A' Level passes in Mathematics or Economics/Business Studies/ and one subject from Accounts, Biology, Geography, Chemistry, Physics and Agriculture/Crop Science/Animal Science OR a Diploma in Agriculture from a recognized Agricultural College. 5 'O' Level passes including English Language, Maths (at least a Grade B in Mathematics and one Science subject from (Biology, Chemistry, Physics, Integrated Science, Physical Science, Agriculture or Combined Science).

Name: Soil Science and Land Management
Description: Focuses on the study of soil properties and sustainable land management practices.
Faculty: Faculty of Agriculture Environment and Food Systems
Requirements: At least 2 'A' Level passes in Chemistry and one subject from Biology, Physics, Mathematics, Geography and Agriculture/Crop Science/Animal Science.

Name: Water and Waste Management Systems
Description: Focuses on the management of water resources and waste disposal systems.
Faculty: Faculty of Agriculture Environment and Food Systems
Requirements: At least 2 'A' Level passes from Chemistry, Biology, Physics, Mathematics, Geography and Agriculture/Crop Science/Animal Science.

Name: Agricultural and Environmental Monitoring Systems
Description: Focuses on systems for monitoring agricultural practices and environmental conditions.
Faculty: Faculty of Agriculture Environment and Food Systems
Requirements: At least 2 'A' Level passes from Chemistry, Biology, Physics, Mathematics, Geography and Agriculture/Crop Science/Animal Science.

Name: Climate Science Resilience and Livelihoods
Description: Focuses on understanding climate science and developing resilient livelihoods in the face of climate change.
Faculty: Faculty of Agriculture Environment and Food Systems
Requirements: At least 2 'A' Level passes from Chemistry, Biology, Physics, Mathematics, Geography and Agriculture/Crop Science/Animal Science.

Name: Applied Environmental Sciences and Technology
Description: Focuses on the application of scientific and technological principles to environmental issues.
Faculty: Faculty of Agriculture Environment and Food Systems
Requirements: At least 2 'A' Level passes in Chemistry and one subject from Biology, Physics, Mathematics, Geography and Agriculture/Crop Science/Animal Science.

Name: Conflict, Peace Building and Social Transformation
Description: Explores theories and practices of conflict resolution, peacebuilding, and societal change.
Faculty: Faculty of Arts and Humanities
Requirements: At least 2 'A' Level passes in Arts and Humanities or Diploma in Peace building or its equivalent.

Name: History of War and Security
Description: Examines historical aspects of warfare, security, and international relations.
Faculty: Faculty of Arts and Humanities
Requirements: At least 2 'A' Level passes in Arts and Humanities or Diploma in War and Security or its equivalent.

Name: Risk Reduction and Disaster Management
Description: Focuses on strategies and practices for reducing risks and managing disasters.
Faculty: Faculty of Arts and Humanities
Requirements: At least 2 'A' Level passes in Arts and Humanities; Social Sciences or Diploma in Disaster Management or its equivalent.

Name: Journalism Media and Broadcasting
Description: Covers principles and practices of journalism, media production, and broadcasting.
Faculty: Faculty of Arts and Humanities
Requirements: At least 2 'A' Level passes in Arts subjects or a Diploma in Media Studies or related area from an approved institution.

Name: Film, Radio and Television Production
Description: Focuses on the practical aspects of producing content for film, radio, and television.
Faculty: Faculty of Arts and Humanities
Requirements: At least 2 'A' Level passes in Arts subjects or a Diploma in Media studies or related area from an approved institution.

Name: Creative Designs Animation and Motion Graphics
Description: Explores creative design principles with a focus on animation and motion graphics.
Faculty: Faculty of Arts and Humanities
Requirements: At least 2 'A' Level passes in Arts subjects.

Name: Media and Marketing Communication
Description: Combines media studies with marketing communication strategies.
Faculty: Faculty of Arts and Humanities
Requirements: At least 2 'A' Level passes in Arts subjects or Commercials.

Name: Multi-Media Production
Description: Focuses on the creation and production of various forms of multimedia content.
Faculty: Faculty of Arts and Humanities
Requirements: At least 2 'A' Level passes in Arts subjects.

Name: Visual and Performing Arts
Description: Explores various forms of visual arts and performing arts.
Faculty: Faculty of Arts and Humanities
Requirements: At least 2 'A' Level passes in Arts subjects.

Name: African Musicology
Description: Focuses on the study of African music, its history, theory, and cultural contexts.
Faculty: Faculty of Arts and Humanities
Requirements: At least 2 'A' Levels in any Arts subjects or a diploma in Music studies or related area from an approved institution.

Name: Fine Arts
Description: Provides training in various fine art disciplines.
Faculty: Faculty of Arts and Humanities
Requirements: At least 2 'A' Levels in any Arts subjects.

Name: Language Literature and Intercultural Communication
Description: Explores language, literature, and communication across different cultures.
Faculty: Faculty of Arts and Humanities
Requirements: Must have obtained a pass at 'A' Level in at least two of the following Arts subjects: Chinese, Dance, Drama, Divinity/Family Religion and Society, Economic History, Economics, Business Studies, English Literature/Literature in English, Film, Fine Art, French, History, Music Arts, Ndebele Language, Ndebele Literature, Shona Language, Shona Literature, Swahili, Tonga, Theatre Arts, Heritage Studies, Geography, Sociology and Mathematics.

Name: Multilingual Communication Translation and Interpretation
Description: Focuses on communication in multiple languages, including translation and interpretation skills.
Faculty: Faculty of Arts and Humanities
Requirements: Must have obtained a pass at 'A' Level in at least two of the following Arts subjects: Chinese, Dance, Drama, Divinity/Family Religion and Society, Economic History, Economics, Business Studies, English Literature/Literature in English, Film, Fine Art, French, History, Music Arts, Ndebele Language, Ndebele Literature, Shona Language, Shona Literature, Swahili, Tonga, Theatre Arts, Heritage Studies, Geography, Sociology and Mathematics.

Name: Multicultural Heritage and Tourism
Description: Explores the intersection of multicultural heritage and the tourism industry.
Faculty: Faculty of Arts and Humanities
Requirements: Must have obtained a pass at 'A' Level in at least two of the following Arts subjects: Chinese, Dance, Drama, Divinity/Family Religion and Society, Economic History, Economics, Business Studies, English Literature/Literature in English, Film, Fine Art, French, History, Music Arts, Ndebele Language, Ndebele Literature, Shona Language, Shona Literature, Swahili, Tonga, Theatre Arts, Heritage Studies, Geography, Sociology and Mathematics.

Name: Heritage and Economic History
Description: Examines the historical development of economies and their relationship with cultural heritage.
Faculty: Faculty of Arts and Humanities
Requirements: At least 2 'A' Level subjects, including Sociology, Economic History, Economics, History, Heritage, Geography, Business Studies.

Name: Zimbabwean History and International Affairs
Description: Focuses on the history of Zimbabwe and its role in international affairs.
Faculty: Faculty of Arts and Humanities
Requirements: At least 2 'A' Level Subjects including History.

Name: Archaeological Sciences and Human Development
Description: Combines archaeological studies with aspects of human development.
Faculty: Faculty of Arts and Humanities
Requirements: At least 2 'A' Level Subjects including History or any other Arts subject and also a pass in 'O' Level Mathematics with Grade C or Better.

Name: African Heritage and Knowledge Systems
Description: Explores African heritage and traditional knowledge systems.
Faculty: Faculty of Arts and Humanities
Requirements: At least 2 'A' Level Subjects including History and any other Arts subject.

Name: Digital Archival and Information Records Management
Description: Focuses on managing digital archives and information records.
Faculty: Faculty of Arts and Humanities
Requirements: At least 2 'A' Level Subjects including any of Heritage Studies, Geography, History, Shona. Applicants should have passed 5 'O' Level subjects including English Language.

Name: Religion Leadership and Society
Description: Examines the role of religion in leadership and society.
Faculty: Faculty of Arts and Humanities
Requirements: At least 2 'A' Level passes in Divinity and any other Arts subjects. Applicants with either post 'O' Level relevant qualification or with relevant work experience may be admitted with the approval of the Faculty/Senate. Applicants should have passed 5 'O' Level subjects including English Language.

Name: Philosophy Ethics and Human Development
Description: Explores philosophical concepts, ethics, and their impact on human development.
Faculty: Faculty of Arts and Humanities
Requirements: At least 2 'A' Level passes in Divinity and any other arts subject. Applicants with either post 'O' Level relevant qualification or with relevant work experience may be admitted with the approval of the Faculty/Senate. Applicants should have passed 5 'O' Level subjects including English Language.

Name: Integrated Tourism Marketing and Internationalization
Description: Focuses on marketing strategies for tourism and its international aspects.
Faculty: Faculty of Business Management Sciences and Economics
Requirements: 5 'O' Level subjects including a pass in English Language and Mathematics. 2 'A' Level subjects including one (1) Commercial subject.

Name: Culinary Arts and Hotel Catering
Description: Provides training in culinary arts and hotel catering management.
Faculty: Faculty of Business Management Sciences and Economics
Requirements: 5 'O' Level subjects including a pass in English Language and Mathematics. 2 'A' Level subjects including one (1) Commercial subject.

Name: Leisure and Hospitality Management
Description: Focuses on the management of leisure and hospitality operations.
Faculty: Faculty of Business Management Sciences and Economics
Requirements: 5 'O' Level subjects including a pass in English Language and Mathematics and at least 2 'A' Level subjects including one (1) Commercial subject.

Name: Economic Tourism and Development
Description: Examines the economic aspects of tourism and its role in development.
Faculty: Faculty of Business Management Sciences and Economics
Requirements: 5 'O' Level subjects including a pass in English Language and Mathematics and at least 2 'A' Level subjects including one (1) Commercial subject.

Name: Business Enterprise Development
Description: Focuses on the development and growth of business enterprises.
Faculty: Faculty of Business Management Sciences and Economics
Requirements: 5 'O' level subjects including a pass in English Language and Mathematics and 3 'A' level subjects which include TWC Commercial subjects.

Name: Public Relations and Marketing
Description: Covers strategies for public relations and marketing.
Faculty: Faculty of Business Management Sciences and Economics
Requirements: 5 'O' level subjects including a pass in English Language and Mathematics and 3 'A' level subjects which include TWC Commercial subjects or a Diploma in relevant field.

Name: Business Marketing Informatics
Description: Combines business marketing with informatics and data analysis.
Faculty: Faculty of Business Management Sciences and Economics
Requirements: 5 'O' level subjects including a pass in English Language and Mathematics and 3 'A' level subjects, 2 of which must be commercial subjects and 'A' level Mathematics.

Name: Human Capital Development Science
Description: Focuses on the scientific principles of human capital development.
Faculty: Faculty of Business Management Sciences and Economics
Requirements: 5 'O' level subjects including a pass in English Language and Mathematics and 3 'A' level subjects which include TWO Commercial subjects.

Name: Business Management Systems Designs and Applications
Description: Focuses on the design and application of business management systems.
Faculty: Faculty of Business Management Sciences and Economics
Requirements: 5 'O' level subjects including a pass in English Language and Mathematics and 3 'A' level subjects, 2 of which must be commercial subjects and 'A' level Mathematics.
